name: NETXP LINUX Special Software - GDS Specific Secrets used
description: Monitors access to GDS (Government Digital Service) specific secrets located in the /etc/puppet/ssl directory. Detection of accesses to this directory helps in maintaining the security of GDS-specific configurations and secrets.
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
//any where auditd.log.key: "puppet_ssl" and 
any where event.module: "auditd"
